SELECT count(1) FROM cpms_system_log l
l.del_flag = 0
and l.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' )
and l.service_name like CONCAT('%',#{serviceName},'%' )
and l.handle_ip = #{handleIp}
and l.req_url like CONCAT('%',#{reqUrl},'%' )
and l.create_by like CONCAT('%',#{createBy},'%' )

SELECT log_id, tenant_id, title, service_name, handle_ip, req_url, req_method, req_params, exe_time, result_msg, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by FROM cpms_system_log l
l.del_flag = 0
and l.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' )
and l.service_name like CONCAT('%',#{serviceName},'%' )
and l.handle_ip = #{handleIp}
and l.req_url like CONCAT('%',#{reqUrl},'%' )
and l.create_by like CONCAT('%',#{createBy},'%' )
limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
